main event: On February 28th, 1949, an observer reported seeing a large cylindrical shaped object flying from east to west, leaving a plume of smoke.
interesting points: The object was seen at an angle of elevation of about 30 to 35 degrees., The plume of smoke was approximately 22 seconds long and had a blue mist color with red to orange dots., The observer compared the size of the object to that of Zeppelin Spectres., The sighting occurred under clear sky conditions., The entire sighting lasted for less than 2 minutes.
